backend/main.mo: Actor that includes the blob‑storage MixinStorage module for backend storage.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a frontend change to fetch the resume from a backend download route.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for all main frontend files covering pages, components, hooks, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/style config defining light and dark theme CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Loads and renders the PortfolioPage as the app root.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Certif: Renders certifications and additional qualifications using resume content with cards and badges.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Contac: Displays contact methods from resume data with clickable cards and a call‑to‑action box.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Educat: Shows education entries with degree, institution, dates, location, and optional details.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Experi: Renders professional experience cards with role info and bullet‑point responsibilities.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Footer: Footer showing copyright, attribution, and optional social links.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/HeroSe: Renders the portfolio hero section with badges, name, title, summary, and buttons including resume download and contact scroll.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Highli: Displays four highlight statistic cards using predefined values and icons.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Langua: Shows language proficiency cards sourced from resumeContent with color indicators and a brief footer note.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Projec: Generates project cards from resumeContent including description, bullets, technologies, and optional GitHub/external links.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Resume: Provides a resume download button that checks asset availability and adjusts UI states accordingly.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Sectio: Reusable section wrapper that renders a titled section with consistent layout and styling.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/Skills: Renders categorized skill cards from resumeContent with badges and a descriptive footer.
frontend/src/components/portfolio/TopNav: Implements a responsive navigation bar with smooth-scroll links, mobile sheet menu, and contact button.
frontend/src/content/resumeContent.ts: Defines resume-related TypeScript interfaces and provides structured resume data for experience, projects, skills, education, and contact.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on change.
Custom hook that checks via HEAD request whether a static asset exists and exposes availability state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing login, stored identity loading, and status states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file exporting nothing, since the portfolio uses no backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light/dark themes, applying global layout and typography rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/PortfolioPage.tsx: Composes the full portfolio page by rendering all portfolio sections and navigation components.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, feature requests, and architecture details for the portfolio site.
